import React from "react"; import NavBar from "../components/Navbar/NavBar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; const Reason = () => { return ( <>

Why?

I choose to recreate this website because...

Even though the "About Us" page looked nice with all those latest technologies, it is a significant part of the website and contained important information such as identity, values, and purpose. While recreating the page, I gained a deeper understanding of the company. And I wanted to provide a fresh new look to the page without losing the essence of the original.

); }; export default Reason;
